scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --compile --minify --outfile 'dist/Moonstone Island Mod Loader'
scripts.start: bun run build && cp 'dist/Moonstone Island Mod Loader' '/home/saturn/Ext/SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/Moonstone Island Mod Loader' && cd '/home/saturn/Ext/SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/Moonstone Island Mod Loader' && ./'Moonstone Island Mod Loader'
